data.text: While the sun and light are not darkened,
In the day wherein the keepers of the house shall tremble,
And they shall shut the doors in the marketplace,
And they shall look up, and fears shall be in the way,
Before the silver cord be let go,
Before the dust also return to the earth as it was,
Vanity of vanities, said the Preacher;
And because the Preacher was wise above others,
The words of the wise are as goads,
And moreover, my son, guard thyself by means of them:
Hear the end of the matter, the sum:
For God will bring every work into judgment,
